verses.verse: הִרְאַנִי֮ <S%H7200><s%> shewed יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וְהִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> behold שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> me and behold two דּוּדָאֵ֣י <S%H1736><s%> baskets תְאֵנִ֔ים <S%H8384><s%> of figs מוּעָדִ֕ים <S%H3259><s%> [were] set לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> the temple יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after הַגְל֣וֹת <S%H1540><s%> had carried away captive נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <S%H5019><s%> that Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֡ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְכָנְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3204><s%> Jeconiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָה֩ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> and the princes יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הֶחָרָ֤שׁ <S%H2796><s%> with the carpenters וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הַמַּסְגֵּר֙ <S%H4525><s%> and smiths מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem וַיְבִאֵ֖ם <S%H935><s%> and had brought בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> them to Babylon

הַדּ֣וּד <S%H1731><s%> basket אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> One תְּאֵנִים֙ <S%H8384><s%> figs טֹב֣וֹת <S%H2896><s%> good מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> [had] very כִּתְאֵנֵ֖י <S%H8384><s%> [even] like the figs הַבַּכֻּר֑וֹת <S%H1073><s%> [that are] first ripe וְהַדּ֣וּד <S%H1731><s%> basket אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> and the other תְּאֵנִים֙ <S%H8384><s%> figs רָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> naughty מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> [had] very אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> could תֵֽאָכַ֖לְנָה <S%H398><s%> which could not be eaten מֵרֹֽעַ׃ <S%H7455><s%> they were so bad ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you רֹאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> unto me What seest יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> said תְּאֵנִ֑ים <S%H8384><s%> Figs הַתְּאֵנִ֤ים <S%H8384><s%> figs הַטֹּבוֹת֙ <S%H2896><s%> the good טֹב֣וֹת <S%H2896><s%> good מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> very וְהָֽרָעוֹת֙ <S%H7451><s%> and the evil רָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> evil מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> very אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot תֵאָכַ֖לְנָה <S%H398><s%> that cannot be eaten מֵרֹֽעַ׃ <S%H7455><s%> they are so evil פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּתְּאֵנִ֥ים <S%H8384><s%> figs הַטֹּב֖וֹת <S%H2896><s%> Like these good הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these כֵּֽן־ <S%H3651><s%> so אַכִּ֞יר <S%H5234><s%> so will I acknowledge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גָּל֣וּת <S%H1546><s%> them that are carried away captive יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom שִׁלַּ֜חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> whom I have sent מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> out of this place הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> of this אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land כַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans לְטוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H2896><s%> for [their] good

וְשַׂמְתִּ֨י <S%H7760><s%> For I will set עֵינִ֤י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> upon לְטוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> upon them for good וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֖ים <S%H7725><s%> and I will bring them again עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> and I וּבְנִיתִים֙ <S%H1129><s%> and I will build וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not אֶהֱרֹ֔ס <S%H2040><s%> them and not pull [them] down וּנְטַעְתִּ֖ים <S%H5193><s%> and I will plant וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not אֶתּֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H5428><s%> them and not pluck [them] up

וְנָתַתִּי֩ <S%H5414><s%> And I will give לָהֶ֨ם לֵ֜ב <S%H3820><s%> them an heart לָדַ֣עַת <S%H3045><s%> to know אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> me that I [am] the LORD וְהָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֣י לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and they shall be my people וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <S%H595><s%> I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> and I will be their God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָשֻׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> for they shall return אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> their whole לִבָּֽם׃ <S%H3820><s%> unto me with their whole heart ס

וְכַתְּאֵנִים֙ <S%H8384><s%> figs הָֽרָע֔וֹת <S%H7451><s%> And as the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot תֵאָכַ֖לְנָה <S%H398><s%> which cannot be eaten מֵרֹ֑עַ <S%H7455><s%> they are so evil כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כֹ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> surely thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אֶ֠תֵּן <S%H5414><s%> So will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִדְקִיָּ֨הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרָיו֙ <S%H8269><s%> and his princes וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> and the residue יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem הַנִּשְׁאָרִים֙ <S%H7604><s%> that remain בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> who וְהַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> and them that dwell בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וּנְתַתִּים֙ <S%H5414><s%> And I will deliver [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַעֲוָ֣ה <S%H2113><s%> be removed ק) לְרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> for [their] hurt לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> for all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> into all the kingdoms הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth לְחֶרְפָּ֤ה <S%H2781><s%> [to be] a reproach וּלְמָשָׁל֙ <S%H4912><s%> and a proverb לִשְׁנִינָ֣ה <S%H8148><s%> a taunt וְלִקְלָלָ֔ה <S%H7045><s%> and a curse בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּקֹמ֖וֹת <S%H4725><s%> in all places אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I אַדִּיחֵ֥ם <S%H5080><s%> whither I shall drive שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וְשִׁלַּ֣חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> And I will send בָ֔ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> the sword אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> the famine וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֑בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and the pestilence עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until תֻּמָּם֙ <S%H8552><s%> among them till they be consumed מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> from off the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> that I gave לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> and to וְלַאֲבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> unto them and to their fathers פ
